name: High School - First Day
description:
It is hard to be a new girl. But don't you think it will be exciting? You will decide everything! It's up to you to be popular or not in your new school. Beware of bullies and stay strong in your first day.

Meet new friends and get ready for drama and adventures with them.

Throw a party, go camping, date with a lover, solve mysteries and much more!

Choose a fashionable cloth to look perfect!

Don't be afraid to make mistakes!
